build.buildCommand: mvn clean package -DskipTests -Prailway && mkdir -p target && echo 'All services built successfully' > target/build-complete.txt

deploy.startCommand: echo 'Multi-module project built successfully. All JAR files:' && find services -name '*.jar' -type f -exec echo 'JAR: {}' \; && echo 'To deploy individual services, create separate Railway services with root directories:' && echo '  - services/api-gateway (Port: 8081)' && echo '  - services/user-service (Port: 8082)' && echo '  - services/order-service (Port: 8083)' && echo '  - services/payment-service (Port: 8084)' && echo '  - services/inventory-service (Port: 8085)' && echo '  - services/streaming-service (Port: 8086)'
